EmailTemplate.subject: February NCR Freshop Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly: February 2023 We’re here for you 24/7 in the Freshop Support Portal Freshop provides a fast and direct way of getting answers to a variety of questions and issues. You will be able to: - Submit help tickets <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/newticket?departmentId=300443000000006907&layoutId=300443000000074011]]> any time of day or night and receive a quick response from our help desk. - The Freshop Status Portal <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/freshop-status-portal]]> provides instant access to Freshop's Operational Status and is updated as we detect issues or outages. - Keep current with new features <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/freshop/features]]> added to the platform. - Learn how to use the Freshop Admin <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/freshop/freshop-admin]]> with step-by-step instructions. - See what Third-Party Integrations <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/freshop/third-party-integrations]]> we have now. - and much more... Our article on How to submit help tickets <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/how-to-submit-a-help-desk]]> will guide you through setting up your free account, show you how to create and submit a ticket and where you can see the status of your inquiry. Sign up for free to access our Freshop Support Portal. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> New Features & Enhancements Fine-tune your slots with the Slot Selection Modal <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/slot-selection-modal]]> and by adding an Order Edit Cutoff <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/slots-order-edit-cutoff]]> time. Show your customers all the available slots with a countdown timer and restrict when customers can make changes to their orders.   Engage your customers. Give shoppers the ability to submit product ratings, give reviews, and leave comments on your website by enabling Product Rating and Review <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/product-rating-and-review]]>. NCR Freshop Knowledge Base Maximize your site's potential and increase a product's visibility by making them easier to find on your site. Feature your fresh, new, seasonal, or holiday collections all together so customers can access them with one click. Learn How to create a featured section on your shop page <[[https://support.freshop.com/portal/en/kb/articles/how-to-create-a-featured-section-on-your-shop-page]]> using the Freshop Admin. NCR Freshop will be at NGA! We’re thrilled to be participating in the 2023 NGA show this month and we hope to see you there! Our industry-leaders will be demonstrating our new, innovative NCR Freshop product features and uncovering what we have planned for this year. Come visit us at our booth #1319! WHEN: February 26-28 WHERE: Caesars Forum Convention Center, Las Vegas, NV Keep an eye out for March's newsletter for more enhancements and features! Thank you!
